name: Four in a Row in 4D
description:
That's right. Four in a row but in 4 dimensions. 

Instead of dropping your tokens in the top of the board and watching them fall like a normal four in a row game, the centre of the board is now the top. Place pieces on any edge of the board and build them toward the centre. 

Standard rules of four in a row apply:
- Get four in a row :)

Controls:
Move cursor: Arrow keys
Select: Z
Back: X
